title: 820-00840 Schottky diodes on PP20V keep breaking
message: A customer sent this in with diodes D3300 and D3400 both shorting the PP20V line. I did the same repair 1,5 months ago on this machine. Suspecting a bad charger, any other things I should check?

title: 820-00840 Schottky diodes on PP20V keep breaking
message:
Nothing more, apart fake charger.
Even if is original, get new original, or Apple certified.
